titles.title: Micro Act of 2022
Micro Act of 2022
Microelectronics Research for Energy Innovation Act of 2022
A bill to provide for a comprehensive and integrative program to accelerate microelectronics research and development at the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Microelectronics Research for Energy Innovation Act of 2022 or the Micro Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Energy to carry out a program, which includes workforce training and development, to accelerate research for designing, developing, and manufacturing next-generation microelectronics.
